Title: Zeal
Description: Zeal is a node-based editor for rapid prototyping procedural textures and HLSL pixel shaders. The project focuses on ease-of-use and UX to allow designers and artists to quickly develop a concept for the overall look and feel of a shader.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Zeal is a node-based editor for rapid prototyping procedural textures and HLSL pixel shaders. The project focuses on ease-of-use and UX to allow designers and artists to quickly develop a concept for the overall look and feel of a shader.

This project uses...

  • QuickGraph
  • GraphSharp
  • AvalonDock

Also check out...

  • Shazzam - Great code editor for WPF/Silverlight pixel shaders
  • Bling UI Toolkit - Write WPF pixel shaders in C# code
